full_description:
Microsoft Surface Studio 2+ Core i7 11th Gen RTX 3060 6GB Graphics 28" Touchscreen All-in-one PC

The Microsoft Surface Studio 2+ is an All-in-one Desktop PC powered by Intel Core i7-11370H (12M Cache, 3.30 GHz, up to 4.80 GHz, with IPU) and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 laptop graphics. It provides the performance you need to run creative and productivity apps with ease. This All-in-one PC comes with 32GB of DDR4 RAM and a 1TB SSD, providing the performance needed for running productivity apps and fast boot times. The Zero Gravity Hinge allows you to find the ideal angle to take advantage of its 28" PixelSense touchscreen.

28" PixelSense Touchscreen

Microsoft Surface Studio 2+ All-in-one PC comes with a large 28" PixelSense display that features a 4500 x 3000 resolution and the signature 3:2 aspect ratio that provides 13% more screen real estate. The display supports a wider spectrum of deeper, more accurate colors and better gradients. It also comes with Dolby Vision support along with multi-touch gesture support. Thanks to the Zero Gravity Hinge, you can find the ideal angle to work on.

Ports and Connectivity

The Surface Studio 2+ features a plethora of ports, including Thunderbolt 4, USB-A, Gigabit Ethernet RJ45 LAN, 3.5 mm audio, and more. It also supports Wi-Fi 6 (802.11ax). You can connect peripherals and accessories wirelessly with Bluetooth 5.1. Log in with Windows Hello, thanks to its front-facing face authentication camera. The webcam can also be used for Microsoft Teams video calls with the help of the dual far-field Studio Mics.
